What features of this product appeal to: As a software developer, I appreciate the flexibility of the contribution options and the ability to set up automatic contributions from my paycheck or other accounts. The personalized savings goals and progress tracking feature is also very appealing to me as it would help me stay on track with my financial goals. And of course, the competitive interest rates are always a plus!

What concerns do you have about using th: One concern I have is the potential for hidden fees or minimum balance requirements. As someone who values honesty, I want to make sure that all fees are transparent and clearly communicated upfront. Additionally, I would want to ensure that my funds are easily accessible in case of an emergency.

Is there anything missing from this prod: As someone who values personal growth and independence, I think it would be helpful if the product offered resources or tools to help customers learn more about personal finance and investing. Additionally, it would be great if the product had a feature that allowed customers to easily transfer funds between their SmartSaver account and other accounts they may have with the credit union.

How easy or difficult do you think it wo: Based on the product features and mechanics described, I think it would be relatively easy to use this product. The ability to set up automatic contributions and track progress towards savings goals using the mobile app or online banking seems very user-friendly. However, I would need to see the actual interface and user experience to make a more informed judgement.

On a scale of 1-10, how likely are you t: As someone who values financial stability and personalized savings goals, I would rate my likelihood of signing up for this product as an 8 out of 10.

As someone who values honesty and transparency, I would only recommend this product to a friend if I had personally used it and found it to be beneficial. Assuming that I had a positive experience with the product, I would rate my likelihood of recommending it to a friend as a 9 out of 10.
